extendedInfo.description: ââ Includes Pick up lines Rapid Love SMS, is a Social Networking / text messaging app that provides an effective means to express your love and strengthen your relationship with your loved one. This application has a lot of useful phrases and good ways to say I love you. Send message to one person or Circle (Group) of people in one-click. Circle is a concept like Google Plus, allowing you to add your contacts to groups. ââ Use PRO version to add unlimited number of contacts into your Circles and to get much added featuresââ Support us If you like this app, please rate âââââ star on the market to encourage us, and also please help to recommend this app to your friends, Thanks.This app can also act as SMS Broadcaster to send SMS message to your Circle (group).Simply browse-N-Select through hundreds of messages that you can SMS to your loved ones. Use Shake-N-Select for random message selection.Includes such CATEGORIES as:â Mother's Day â Father's Day â Marriage Textsâ Pick-up lines (for fun only)â I Love Uâ I Miss Uâ Apologyâ Romantic Birthday textsâ Romantic Textâ Funny Birthday textsâ Anniversary â Valentine Day â Wedding / Engagement â New Baby â Thank Youâ Friendshipâ Yo Mamma Yo Pappaâ Insults!â New YearÂ â Happy Hanukkah!â Merry ChristmasSet up:Very simple, Tap app Help icon for detail info. You can also watch the YouTube Instructional video or contact developer via in-app feedback.keywords: SMS Broadcast, Love Quotes, Quotes, Love Messages, Thank You Quotes, Love SMS, Romantic Messages, Romantic SMS, Valentine's Quotes, Valentine's Messages, Valentines Quotes, Valentines Messages, Valentine's Day, Valentines Day, Valentine, Love Poems, Love Greetings, Valentines Greetings, Ramadan, Passion, Romance, Rose, Love, Heart, Soul, Father Day, Mother Day, 4th July, Veterans Day, pick-up lines, pickup lines, pick up lines, pick up quotes, Valentine text

reviews.title: Awesome app

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I like the app, it just needs a.few more categories like \" sorry for your loss\" and a random one for when a person cant respond right aeay. All in all, its very clever, i love it.

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: Outdated. The birthday ones are so simple and vague, \"I love you luv u luv you. Happy birthday\"....wth is that?! How is that at all clever or worth sending to anyone. Poorly executed, no.copy and paste, adverts, harassment to upgrade (I\'d never do unless I wanted a up momma joke from the mid-90\'s\" fun to look at once but not worth dl\'ing to legit use. Just 5minute time killer app.
